Rodimus:

the male sighed "I don't know more about this creature... excpet =
that it's a femme and call hersel Sedna"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, May 23, 200=
5 6:10 PM
  Subject: Re: Windlord/Rodimus/Malice


  Silence::

  She turne=
d to Rodimus. "Uh, well, it may or may not be what you wanted
  to hear. Bu=
t first, I must ask to be able to see the object itself
  before I do anyth=
ing. One cannot damage the host of a parasite to
  remove the parasite. The=
 host is the victim and must survive. But, if
  it is discovered that it is=
 a symbiotic relationship, both may
  actually be benefitting. However, if =
from what you have told me, be as
  little as possible as it may have been,=
 I will endevour to
  successfully remove this, erhm, thing from your belov=
ed."  She tried
  to as a little flair to her performance, hoping to the Ma=
trix that it
  might instill a little confidence in Rodimus that she might =
actually
  know more than she did. It wasn't that she wasn't really smart, =
she
  was. But this would be her first mission, so to speak. And she wasn't=

  going to let anything come between her and success. SHe gave him a
  hop=
eful smile, "Is there anything else about this Vok instrument that
  I'll n=
eed to know?"


  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> w=
rote:
  > Rodimus:
  > 
  > Rodimus smiled back, it seems that the little o=
ne was camly, that
  was good. He looked her and said "About your asignamet=
s I was thinking
  that you could help us to take that Vok's thing away my =
wife... and I
  remember that you had a plan..."

age -----

  >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  >   =
Sent: Friday, May 20, 2005 1:52 AM

ce

  >   Silence::
  > 
  >   She looked at him. She let her opti=
cs look closer at Rodimus.
  >   Something in him reminded her of someone. =
Someone from her past.
  >   Someone she respected and honored. She smiled =
back at him with a smile
  >   that reflected the relief she felt just by k=
nowing he thought all was
  >   alright.
